Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: startRecording()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Begin recording video.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: cancelRecording()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Cancel recording video.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: finishRecording(completion:)
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Finish recording the video.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: applyLens(_:completion:)
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Apply a specified lens.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: clearLens(willReapply:completion:)
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Clear the currently selected lens, and return to unmodified camera feed.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: reapplyCurrentLens()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: If a lens has already been applied, reapply it.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: enableToneMapAdjustment()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Enables the tone map adjustment.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: disableToneMapAdjustment()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Disables the tone map adjustment.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: enablePortraitAdjustment()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Enables the portrait adjustment.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: disablePortraitAdjustment()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Disables the portrait adjustment.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: brightnessToRestore
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Temporary state that holds the brightness that should be restored after the ring light is disabled.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: enableFlash()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Enables the camera flash with the appopriate flash mode as per camera position and prior user selections.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: disableFlash()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Disables the camera flash.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: restoreBrightnessIfNecessary()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Restores brightness to what it was before the ring light was enabled.

Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.name: increaseBrightnessIfNecessary()
Classes/CameraController.html#/s:25SCSDK.abstract: Increases brightness to max if the ring light is enabled.

Classes/CameraController.html.name: CameraController
Classes/CameraController.html.abstract: A controller which manages the camera and lenses stack on behalf of its owner

Classes/CameraButton.html.name: CameraButton
Classes/CameraButton.html.abstract: Camera ring view for capturing and recording state

Classes/CameraConfigurableActionView.htm.name: CameraConfigurableActionView
Classes/CameraConfigurableActionView.htm.abstract: View to use for camera actions that can be enabled/disabled and configured via separate buttons.

Classes/CameraView.html.name: CameraView
Classes/CameraView.html.abstract: This is the default view that backs the CameraViewController.

Classes/CameraViewController.html.name: CameraViewController
Classes/CameraViewController.html.abstract: This is the default view controller which handles setting up the camera, lenses, carousel, etc.

Classes/CarouselCollectionViewCell.html.name: CarouselCollectionViewCell
Classes/CarouselCollectionViewCell.html.abstract: Carousel collection view cell which represents a single lens item/icon

Classes/CarouselCollectionViewLayout.htm.name: CarouselCollectionViewLayout
Classes/CarouselCollectionViewLayout.htm.abstract: Custom collection view layout for carousel collection view

Classes/DefaultCarouselImageLoader.html.name: DefaultCarouselImageLoader
Classes/DefaultCarouselImageLoader.html.abstract: Default image loader class which uses a URLSession to load images

Classes/CarouselItem.html.name: CarouselItem
Classes/CarouselItem.html.abstract: This is the carousel item view model which represents a specific lens icon

Classes/EmptyItem.html.name: EmptyItem
Classes/EmptyItem.html.abstract: Concrete class for an empty item (clear camera button)

Classes/CarouselView.html.name: CarouselView
Classes/CarouselView.html.abstract: A view that manages an ordered collection of data items (eg. lenses) and displays them in a swipeable row with one item always selected.

Classes/BundleHelper.html.name: BundleHelper
Classes/BundleHelper.html.abstract: Internal helper to deal with resources bundle

Classes/KeyboardAccessoryViewProvider.ht.name: KeyboardAccessoryViewProvider
Classes/KeyboardAccessoryViewProvider.ht.abstract: Reference implementation of a text input view for lenses that take text input.

Classes/ImagePreviewViewController.html.name: ImagePreviewViewController
Classes/ImagePreviewViewController.html.abstract: Preview view controller for showing captured photos and images

Classes/PreviewViewController.html.name: PreviewViewController
Classes/PreviewViewController.html.abstract: Base preview view controller that describes properties and views of all preview controllers

Classes/VideoPreviewViewController.html.name: VideoPreviewViewController
Classes/VideoPreviewViewController.html.abstract: Preview view controller for showing recorded video previews

Classes/UserDataProvider.html.name: UserDataProvider
Classes/UserDataProvider.html.abstract: Default user data provider to show how to provide user data to CameraKit

Classes/CameraBottomBar.html.name: CameraBottomBar
Classes/CameraBottomBar.html.abstract: Bottom bar on Camera that contains Snap ghost button for actions

Classes/MessageNotificationView.html.name: MessageNotificationView
Classes/MessageNotificationView.html.abstract: Popup message notification view for different lens events

Classes/TapAnimationView.html.name: TapAnimationView
Classes/TapAnimationView.html.abstract: View that appears when the user taps on the camera view
